author: Mr.corol
created_time: March 14, 2023, 04:24:34 AMLast edit: March 14, 2023, 05:35:07 AM by Mr.corol
content: I bought a $14.55 bitcoin a few days ago when it was at 22k. Again Bitcoin came to 19k. However, I did not sell bitcoins. I was convinced that the price of Bitcoin would rise again. I buy $50 worth of bitcoins again. Got some profit on this small investment. Looking at Bitcoin 24k today. I will keep it for a long time and will not sell it now. I think at some point bitcoin will pump a lotSince I can't invest more dollars, I don't have that much money. Still will invest as much as possible.

comments.author: Cuenta Alternativa
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.corol on March 14, 2023, 04:24:34 AM Got some profit on this small investment.Have you sold? If you haven't, that actually is not a profit, it's called unrealised profit.Quote from: Mr.corol on March 14, 2023, 04:24:34 AMI bought a $14.55 bitcoin a few days ago when it was at 22k. Again Bitcoin came to 19k. However, I did not sell bitcoins. I was convinced that the price of Bitcoin would rise again. I buy $50 worth of bitcoins again. Sounds like you are short of money. I hope you're not using money to buy bitcoin that you might need to eat. As long as you're doing it with money you won't need in a few years, keep buying small amounts regularly, it's called DCA, as iwantmyhomepaidwithbtc2 says.
